body_html: I have met stuck problem(I think it may happen in warm up if I'm right.) when all workers finished all steps. I think global_step should be protected by a lock.I raised an issue. I'm not sure if tensorflow has some special code for global_step.
body_text: I have met stuck problem(I think it may happen in warm up if I'm right.) when all workers finished all steps. I think global_step should be protected by a lock.I raised an issue. I'm not sure if tensorflow has some special code for global_step.
body: I have met stuck problem(I think it may happen in warm up if I'm right.) when all workers finished all steps. I think `global_step` should be protected by a lock.I raised [an issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks/issues/38). I'm not sure if tensorflow has some special code for `global_step`.
